original_text: And Saul armed David with his armour, and he put an helmet of brass upon his head; also he armed him with a coat of mail.
korean_text: 이에 사울이 자기 군복을 다윗에게 입히고 놋 투구를 그의 머리에 씌우고 또 그에게 갑옷을 입히매

sentences.original_text: And Saul armed David with his armour
and he put an helmet of brass upon his head
also he armed him with a coat of mail
